info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 8:07AM EDT until July 15 at 9:30AM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Brevard, Orange and Osceola.
* WHEN...Until 930 AM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 805 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving showers and thunderstorms producing heavy rain in the vicinity of State Road 520 and Nova Road. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rockledge and Lone Cabbage Fish Camp. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM EDT THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Brevard, FL; Orange, FL; Osceola, FL
